creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
description: hardcover book with blue and white woodblock printed label; tan and white pattern of rings in background; contains various abstract prints and typed descriptions

title: Varieties of the Japanese Print (Vol. 1)
